<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change label of software_model column to "Minimum viable software model"</description>
        <name>SAM - Change Label of Software Model</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function renameSoftwareModelLabel() {
	var label = 'Minimum viable software model';
	var plural = 'Minimum viable software model';

	// Update sys_documentation
	var docGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
	docGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_sam_sw_install');
	docGr.addQuery('element', 'software_model');
	docGr.addQuery('language', 'en');
	docGr.addQuery('label', '!=', label);
	docGr.query();
	if (docGr.next()) {
		docGr.setValue('label', label);
		docGr.setValue('plural', plural);
		docGr.update();
	}

	// update sys_dictionary
	var dictGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	dictGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_sam_sw_install');
	dictGr.addQuery('element', 'software_model');
	dictGr.addQuery('column_label', '!=', label);
	dictGr.query();
	if (dictGr.next()) {
		dictGr.setValue('column_label', label);
		dictGr.update();
	}
}

renameSoftwareModelLabel();]]></script>
